com.lohika.alp.log4j
Class Appenders

java.lang.Object
  com.lohika.alp.log4j.Appenders

public class Appenders
extends java.lang.Object

A container to keep all Appender instances of a test method, where each appender belongs to its own TestAppenderDispatcher

Lock objects is used to separate appenders per their dispatchers.

No operations are allowed if Appenders are already closed.

Not synchronized.

Author:
Mikhail Holovaty

closeAppenders

public void closeAppenders()
Invokes org.apache.log4j.Appender.close for all appenders of related test method.

This is used to free system resources after the test method execution.

areClosed

public boolean areClosed()
Returns:
true if appenders are closed
